name: keishima
description: Keishima (景島 From KEItarou uraSHIMA, from anime Love Hina) is a port to typescript of [Kuroshiro] (https://github.com/hexenq/kuroshiro) and [kuroshiro-analyzer-kuromoji](https://github.com/hexenq/kuroshiro-analyzer-kuromoji) (and slightly simplified) authored by [HexenQ] (https://github.com/hexenq). Keishima allows getting the furigana and okurigana versions of a text with kanji
author: Miguel Angel Moreno
